name: Dr. Tomy
overview:
Dr. Tomy is an adult themed puzzle game developed and published by Playmark for Arcades.

Gameplay

In Dr. Tomy players try and clear a board with various viruses by dropping colored pills into the play area. Once four of the same colored sections of pills/viruses are in a row they will be eliminated.

After a player successfully completes a puzzle, an image of a woman will appear. Each time the image shows up there will be one less article of clothing.

One of the various women that could be selected in the game is named as Chun-Li, which is a non-authorized reference of the Street Fighter II: The World Warrior character of the same name.

The game is known to be released at least in Italy, since the game has a Dip Switch to switch the language between English and Italian.
